Room.Name: Main Courtyard - Southwest Corner
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the southwest corner of the great open courtyard of Castle Rutger.
Room.LongDescription: There is a ramp here that leads up to the battlements on the west side of of the Tower Castle over the front gates. The castle, built on the steep side of a mountain, needs to be defended from only the west side. The ramp is wide and looks like a lot of troops could be moved quickly over it.
